/* SA012004.selectListSA012004 */ select t1.ipgumdate, (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as branchname , (select kname from hr_insamst where insacode = t1.salercd) as kname, t1.conname, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '009' and dcode = t1.ipgumgubun) as ipgumgubun, t1.ipgumamt, (select sum(sugumamt) from sa_ipgumdtl where ipgumid = t1.ipgumid) as sugumamt, (t1.ipgumamt - (select sum(sugumamt) from sa_ipgumdtl where ipgumid = t1.ipgumid)) as jangumamt, (select bankname from sy_bankmst where bankcode = bankgubun) as bankname, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '012' and dcode = t1.ipgumtype) as ipgumtype, t1.address, t1.conpy, t1.remark from sa_ipgummst t1 where t1.R_IPGUMID IS NULL
AND t1.ipgumdate BETWEEN #S_IPGUMDATE_FR# AND #S_IPGUMDATE_TO#
AND t1.branchcode = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND t1.salercd = #S_SALERCD#
AND t1.ipgumgubun = #S_IPGUMGUBUN#
AND t1.ipgumperson LIKE '%$S_IPGUMPERSON$%'
AND t1.ipgumamt LIKE '%$S_IPGUMAMT$%'
order by t1.ipgumdate asc
